mapper.select: select * from showroom order writingtime desc
select * from showroom order viewcount desc
mapper.update: update showroom set sr_viewcount=sr_viewcount+1 where sr_num=#{sr_num}
mapper.insert: insert into showroom (sr_writer, sr_title, sr_contents, sr_image1, sr_image1, sr_image1, sr_image1, sr_image1) values (#{sr_writer},#{sr_title},#{sr_content},#{sr_imgname1},#{sr_imgname2},#{sr_imgname3},#{sr_imgname4},#{sr_imgname5})
mapper.update: update showroom set sr_title=#{sr_title}, sr_contents=#{sr_contents} where sr_num=#{sr_num}
